resources.string:
\1 - Go to the settings and find this app and enable all the links (EXCEPT the music app you use daily)

So If you use Spotify. do not enable Spotify link of this app
(This is to prevent this app opening if you click Spotify link)


2 - If you have other music APPS in your phone. Go to their settings and turn off their links.
EX:
So If you have both Apple Music app and Spotify. and you use Spotify for your music

Turn off apple music links from the phone settings.
Or delete the app that works too :)
This app searches songs for you from other music providers links, in your favorite music provider, So If you see a link of other music providers just click it and the app will try to search for it.
I\'m a Software Engineer from Saudi Arabia. I\'ve been developing Android applications since 2013 and professionally since 2015.\n\nClick the image to see my public projects on Github
Here you can disable redirecting for a single provider (useful if a song is only available in one provider only)
